sentences.sentence: Critics viewed him as a reactionary, even a monarchist.
sentences.translation: 批评者们把他看成是反动分子，甚至是君主主义者。

sentences.sentence: A monarchist party is running in the forthcoming elections.
sentences.translation: 一个主张君主政体的政党要参加即将来临的大选。

sentences.sentence: One of those sentenced to death was said to be a member of a pro-monarchist group.
sentences.translation: 据称，其中一名被判刑者是反君主主义组织的成员。
